channel.title: Members Code

item.title: Members Code
item.dc:creator: @Ckstunnerscape Ckstunner
item.description:
@Ckstunnerscape wrote:

You do it Wrong, Its ::makemem(username) You done put any spaces between ::makemem and the user name

Thanks,
CkstunnerScape

Here is a code that lets mods+ do it

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && playerRights >= 1) { try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } else { disconnected = true; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Members Code
item.dc:creator: @I_kasoy_II Sohail
item.description:
@I_kasoy_II wrote:

Hi i use figmentscape 4.5 and i got a question could you make out of this code

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("MasterGamer") try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } }

A Code that will kick the player when it i would do the command example --> ::makememi kasoy ii and i kasoy ii get kicked and is member so could you help me?

Read full topic
